command_line: export BCFTOOLS_PLUGINS=`which bcftools | sed 's,bin/bcftools,libexec/bcftools,'`;     bgzip -c '/galaxy/server/database/objects/1/e/e/dataset_1eeb4e8b-9165-4cc0-99eb-2982a06af3c0.dat' > input.vcf.gz && bcftools index input.vcf.gz &&        bcftools call  -m --gvcf 0 --prior 0.0011                      --output-type 'v'   --threads ${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4}    input.vcf.gz  > '/galaxy/server/database/objects/c/3/b/dataset_c3b2b401-c3b8-4189-843f-50d7da0b3ed5.dat'
